title: Latvia Average Monthly Net Wages
description: Wages in Latvia increased to 1012 EUR/Month in June from 997 EUR/Month in May of 2022. Wages in Latvia averaged 449.59 EUR/Month from 1997 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 1050 EUR/Month in December of 2021 and a record low of 113 EUR/Month in January of 1997. In Latvia, wages are benchmarked using average monthly earnings. This page provides - Latvia Average Monthly Wages - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Central Statistical Bureau of Latvia
